original: @250b * // rgya gar skad du //
analyzed: @250b * // rgya gar skad du //
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: pinda ni brta na ni rde sha k'a r'i k'a /
analyzed: pinda ni brta na ni rde sha k'a r'i k'a /
translated: Pinḍanīvarta-nirdeśa-kārikā.

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: sdog pa bsdus pa bstan pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa /
analyzed: sdog pa bsdus pa bstan pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa /
translated: The Verses That Explain the Compendium of Aggregates.

original: 'jam pa'i dpal mgon de la phyag 'tshal te //
analyzed: 'jam pa'i dpal mgon de la phyag 'tshal te //
translated: Homage to that protector Mañjuśrī.

original: sgra dang bstan bcos mkhas pa'i mthar gyur pa //
analyzed: sgra dang bstan bcos mkhas pa'i mthar gyur pa //
translated: Having become the ultimate expert in grammar and treatises,🔽The preceptors Pāṇini, Paiṭha, Vyāḍi, Candragomin,

original: p'a ni ni dang pa bya tsandra dang // ratna ma ti gad ba zla @251a * //
analyzed: p'a ni ni dang pa bya tsandra dang // ratna ma ti gad ba zla @251a * //
translated: Ratnamati, Gavāṃpati, Candra,

original: ba dang // ni man sa ka la sogs mkhan po yis //
analyzed: ba dang // ni man sa ka la sogs mkhan po yis //
translated: Nāman, Śākalya, and so forth,

original: dgag pa'i bye brag rgya cher bshad pa las //
analyzed: dgag pa'i bye brag rgya cher bshad pa las //
translated: From the extensive explanation of the distinctions of negation,

original: dman pa'i don du nyung zad bstan par 'dod //
analyzed: dman pa'i don du nyung zad bstan par 'dod //
translated: I wish to teach a little for the sake of the inferior.

original: mkhan pos bstan pa'i mdo dag las //
analyzed: mkhan pos bstan pa'i mdo dag las //
translated: From the sūtras taught by the preceptor,

original: dgag pa'i bye brag mang bshad kyang //
analyzed: dgag pa'i bye brag mang bshad kyang //
translated: Although many distinctions of negation are explained,🔽The explanations of the complete compendium🔽Are the compendium of the sūtras in brief,🔽The distinctions of the compendium in dependence,

original: kun nas bsdu ba bshad pa dag / rnam grangs mdo ru bsdu ba dang // bsdu ba'i bye brag ltos pa dang // rab tu gsal bar brjod pa bzhi //
analyzed: kun nas bsdu ba bshad pa dag / rnam grangs mdo ru bsdu ba dang // bsdu ba'i bye brag ltos pa dang // rab tu gsal bar brjod pa bzhi //
translated: And the very clear explanation, these four.

original: 'di dag tsam du shes par bya //
analyzed: 'di dag tsam du shes par bya //
translated: One should know just these.

original: med dang gzhan dang 'dra ba dang // dman dang zhum dang zhan pa dang // phra dang nyung dang myur ba dang // chung dang lhag ma med pa dang // 'ga' las mtha' dag ma yin dang // mi mthun gnyen po bral ba yis //
analyzed: med dang gzhan dang 'dra ba dang // dman dang zhum dang zhan pa dang // phra dang nyung dang myur ba dang // chung dang lhag ma med pa dang // 'ga' las mtha' dag ma yin dang // mi mthun gnyen po bral ba yis //
translated: Not all from some,🔽Opposing antidotes.

original: rnam grangs bco lngar bshad pa yin //
analyzed: rnam grangs bco lngar bshad pa yin //
translated: These are explained as fifteen categories.

original: de las cung zad bsdu ba ni //
analyzed: de las cung zad bsdu ba ni //
translated: A brief summary of those

original: brgyad nas gnyis kyi bar du ste //
analyzed: brgyad nas gnyis kyi bar du ste //
translated: Is from eight up to two.

original: zhum dang zhan pa dman par te //
analyzed: zhum dang zhan pa dman par te //
translated: Depressed, weak, inferior,

original: phra ba la sogs drug gcig tu //
analyzed: phra ba la sogs drug gcig tu //
translated: Subtle and so forth are combined into one,

original: sbyar bas dgag pa'i rnam grangs brgyad //
analyzed: sbyar bas dgag pa'i rnam grangs brgyad //
translated: Making eight categories of negation.

original: mi mthun gnyen por sbyar bas bdun //
analyzed: mi mthun gnyen por sbyar bas bdun //
translated: Combined with opposing antidotes, there are seven.

original: dman dang chung ba zhum pa ru //
analyzed: dman dang chung ba zhum pa ru //
translated: Inferior, small, and depressed🔽Are the six types of categories of negation.🔽Meaning understood by implication,🔽Establishing with a single word,

original: dgag pa'i rnam grangs rnam pa drug / don gyis go bar byed pa dang // tshig gcig rnam par sgrub pa dang // de ldan rang tshig mi ston pa //
analyzed: dgag pa'i rnam grangs rnam pa drug / don gyis go bar byed pa dang // tshig gcig rnam par sgrub pa dang // de ldan rang tshig mi ston pa //
translated: Not showing one's own words in that way,

original: de las gzhan pa gzhan yin no //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa gzhan yin no //
translated: Are different from that.

original: kun du brtag pa 'gog pa dang // rang gi gzhi las zhum pa dang // gzhan dang 'gal ba rnam pa bzhi //
analyzed: kun du brtag pa 'gog pa dang // rang gi gzhi las zhum pa dang // gzhan dang 'gal ba rnam pa bzhi //
translated: And the four kinds of contradiction with others.🔽The three ways of engaging the meaning of nonexistence,

original: med pa dang ni gzhan pa dang // gnyen po'i don la 'jug pa gsum //
analyzed: med pa dang ni gzhan pa dang // gnyen po'i don la 'jug pa gsum //
translated: Otherness, and the antidote.

original: dgag pa'i rnam grangs ji snyed pa //
analyzed: dgag pa'i rnam grangs ji snyed pa //
translated: All the synonyms of negation

original: med dang ma yin gnyis su 'du //
analyzed: med dang ma yin gnyis su 'du //
translated: Are included in the two, nonexistence and not being.🔽The object of expression is existent and nonexistent,🔽The mode of engagement is direct and indirect,🔽The refutation of the investigation,🔽The teaching of the thatness of phenomena,

original: bstan bya don yod don med dang // 'jug tshul dngos dang brgyud pa dang // kun du brtags pa bzlog pa dang // chos kyi de nyid bstan pa dang // gzhan gyi 'dod pa bsal ba dang // rang gi 'dod pa 'ang sgrub pa dang //
analyzed: bstan bya don yod don med dang // 'jug tshul dngos dang brgyud pa dang // kun du brtags pa bzlog pa dang // chos kyi de nyid bstan pa dang // gzhan gyi 'dod pa bsal ba dang // rang gi 'dod pa 'ang sgrub pa dang //
translated: The elimination of others’ assertions,🔽And the establishment of one’s own assertions.

original: 'byung ba'i dus kyi khyad par gyis //
analyzed: 'byung ba'i dus kyi khyad par gyis //
translated: The distinctions of the time of arising

original: bsdus pa'i bye brag shes par bya //
analyzed: bsdus pa'i bye brag shes par bya //
translated: Should be understood as the distinctions of the compilations.🔽The meaning, the mode of engagement, the purpose,

original: don dang 'jug tshul dgos pa dang // 'jug dus dbang ste go rims bzhin//🔽mad pa'i bstan bya don med de //
analyzed: don dang 'jug tshul dgos pa dang // 'jug dus dbang ste go rims bzhin// mad pa'i bstan bya don med de //
translated: And the time of engagement are the four in order.🔽The object of expression of nonexistence is nonexistent,

original: ma yin pa ni don yod pa'o //
analyzed: ma yin pa ni don yod pa'o //
translated: And the object of expression of not being is existent.

original: de bzhin med pa dngos su 'jug //
analyzed: de bzhin med pa dngos su 'jug //
translated: Similarly, nonexistence engages directly,🔽And not being engages indirectly.

original: ma yin pa ni brgyud pas so //
analyzed: ma yin pa ni brgyud pas so //
translated: The latter is indirect.

original: kun rtog zlog pa med pa ste //
analyzed: kun rtog zlog pa med pa ste //
translated: It is not the reversal of imagination.

original: de nyid ston pa ma yin pa'o //🔽gzhan gyi 'dod pa sel ba ni //
analyzed: de nyid ston pa ma yin pa'o // gzhan gyi 'dod pa sel ba ni //
translated: It is not the teaching of reality.🔽The purpose of nonaffirming negation

original: med par dgag pa'i dgos pa ste //
analyzed: med par dgag pa'i dgos pa ste //
translated: is to eliminate the assertions of others,

original: rang 'dod sgrub pa ma @251b yin pa'o //
analyzed: rang 'dod sgrub pa ma @251b yin pa'o //
translated: not to establish one’s own assertions.🔽When one wishes to eliminate

original: ma rtogs log rtogs the tshom dag //
analyzed: ma rtogs log rtogs the tshom dag //
translated: non-understanding, misunderstanding, and doubt,

original: sel 'dod dus na med pa 'byung //
analyzed: sel 'dod dus na med pa 'byung //
translated: nonaffirming negation arises.

original: don nyid khong du chud 'dod na //
analyzed: don nyid khong du chud 'dod na //
translated: When one wishes to understand the meaning itself,

original: ma yin dgag pa 'byung bar 'gyur //🔽dgag pa'i sgra dang dgag bya yis //
analyzed: ma yin dgag pa 'byung bar 'gyur // dgag pa'i sgra dang dgag bya yis //
translated: affirming negation arises.🔽The purpose of the words of negation

original: bstan par bya ba don du 'dod //
analyzed: bstan par bya ba don du 'dod //
translated: is to teach the object of negation.

original: tshul ni 'di ru thabs su 'dod //🔽don des ji ltar ston byed pa'i //
analyzed: tshul ni 'di ru thabs su 'dod // don des ji ltar ston byed pa'i //
translated: The method is asserted here to be the means.

original: thabs kyi 'bras bu dgos pa'o //
analyzed: thabs kyi 'bras bu dgos pa'o //
translated: The result of the means is the purpose🔽of how the meaning is taught.

original: 'byung dus rnam pa bzhir bshad pa //
analyzed: 'byung dus rnam pa bzhir bshad pa //
translated: The time of arising is explained to be fourfold.

original: smra bar byed pa gang zhig gis //
analyzed: smra bar byed pa gang zhig gis //
translated: Whatever is the means of expression

original: yid la byed pa gang ldan pa //
analyzed: yid la byed pa gang ldan pa //
translated: and whatever mental activity

original: 'dod ldan 'byung ba'i dus su 'dod //
analyzed: 'dod ldan 'byung ba'i dus su 'dod //
translated: is asserted as the time of arising for the desirous.

original: bye brag rtsa ba 'di yin te //
analyzed: bye brag rtsa ba 'di yin te //
translated: This is the root of the distinctions.

original: med pa yod pa mi sgrub ste //
analyzed: med pa yod pa mi sgrub ste //
translated: Nonexistence does not establish existence.

original: ma yin pa ni yin pa sgrub //
analyzed: ma yin pa ni yin pa sgrub //
translated: Non-existence is the establishment of what is not.🔽The effect is in the cause, as it is,

original: rgyu la 'bras bu de bzhin dang // tha dad dngos dang brtags pa tsam //
analyzed: rgyu la 'bras bu de bzhin dang // tha dad dngos dang brtags pa tsam //
translated: Different, and merely imputed.🔽Non-existence as a basis for negation is🔽Non-existence prior, non-existence after,

original: snga na med dang zhig pa dang // phan tshun gcig la gcig med dang // shin tu med par gyur pa dag / med par dgag pa'i gzhir gyur pa //
analyzed: snga na med dang zhig pa dang // phan tshun gcig la gcig med dang // shin tu med par gyur pa dag / med par dgag pa'i gzhir gyur pa //
translated: Mutual non-existence, and utter non-existence.

original: gal te yod pa'i dngos 'dod na //
analyzed: gal te yod pa'i dngos 'dod na //
translated: If one asserts existent entities,

original: med par dgag par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: med par dgag par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: It is not a negation of non-existence.

original: de phyir yod pa mi sgrub ste //
analyzed: de phyir yod pa mi sgrub ste //
translated: Therefore, existence is not established,

original: med pa'i yod pa'ang mi sgrub po //
analyzed: med pa'i yod pa'ang mi sgrub po //
translated: Nor is the existence of non-existence established.🔽The object of indication is meaningless,🔽The term itself engages directly,🔽The purpose is to eliminate examination,🔽And likewise, others' assertions,

original: de yis bstan bya don med dang // sgra nyid dngos su 'jug pa dang // dgos pa brtags pa sel ba dang // de bzhin gzhan gyi 'dod pa dang // 'byung ba'i dus ni gsum du brjod //🔽gzhan dang gnyen po la sogs pa'i //
analyzed: de yis bstan bya don med dang // sgra nyid dngos su 'jug pa dang // dgos pa brtags pa sel ba dang // de bzhin gzhan gyi 'dod pa dang // 'byung ba'i dus ni gsum du brjod // gzhan dang gnyen po la sogs pa'i //
translated: And the time of occurrence is said to be threefold.🔽Other than that, the conventional negations

original: ma yin dgag pa tha snyad dag / gang zhig yin pa bzlog pa yis //
analyzed: ma yin dgag pa tha snyad dag / gang zhig yin pa bzlog pa yis //
translated: Are non-affirming negations, such as antidotes and so forth.🔽By what is affirmed,

original: yin pa'i dngos po gzhan du tshol //
analyzed: yin pa'i dngos po gzhan du tshol //
translated: The affirmed entity is sought elsewhere.

original: ma yin tsam du mi sgrub ste //
analyzed: ma yin tsam du mi sgrub ste //
translated: Non-existence is not established.

original: de phyir ma yin dgag pa ni //
analyzed: de phyir ma yin dgag pa ni //
translated: Therefore, non-implicative negation

original: yin pa'i dngos po sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: yin pa'i dngos po sgrub pa'o //
translated: is the establishment of a positive phenomenon.🔽The object of expression of that is🔽the expressed, the indirect mode of engagement,🔽the teaching of the suchness of phenomena,🔽the establishment of one’s own assertions,

original: de yis bstan bya don yod dang // brgyud pa'i tshul gyis 'jug pa dang // chos kyi de nyid ston pa dang // rang gi 'dod pa sgrub ba dang // 'byung dus gcig tu brjod pa yin //
analyzed: de yis bstan bya don yod dang // brgyud pa'i tshul gyis 'jug pa dang // chos kyi de nyid ston pa dang // rang gi 'dod pa sgrub ba dang // 'byung dus gcig tu brjod pa yin //
translated: and the time of occurrence, which is said to be one.

original: yid la byed pa'i khyad par dag //
analyzed: yid la byed pa'i khyad par dag //
translated: The distinctions of mental engagement

original: smra ba gang gi blo la gnas //
analyzed: smra ba gang gi blo la gnas //
translated: are the ones that dwell in the mind of the speaker.

original: de ni bye brag gnyis kyi rgyu //
analyzed: de ni bye brag gnyis kyi rgyu //
translated: Those are the causes of the two divisions.

original: yid la byed pa'i bye brag ni //
analyzed: yid la byed pa'i bye brag ni //
translated: The distinctions of mental engagement

original: 'byung ba'i dus kyis shes par bya //
analyzed: 'byung ba'i dus kyis shes par bya //
translated: are to be understood by the time of occurrence.

original: de ni yul gyis phye ba ste //
analyzed: de ni yul gyis phye ba ste //
translated: That is divided by the object,

original: dgos pa brjod pa ji lta ba'o //
analyzed: dgos pa brjod pa ji lta ba'o //
translated: just as the statement of purpose is expressed.

original: 'dod pa'i yul zhes bya ba ste //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yul zhes bya ba ste //
translated: The object of desire is called

original: rgyu yi bye brag brjod pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu yi bye brag brjod pa'o //
translated: the expression of the distinction of the cause.

original: ma yin dgag pa'i bye brag ni //🔽lhan cig rgyun la gnod byed dang // de bzhin mi byed dbye ba yis //
analyzed: ma yin dgag pa'i bye brag ni // lhan cig rgyun la gnod byed dang // de bzhin mi byed dbye ba yis //
translated: The distinction of non-implicative negation🔽is expressed as the antidote and the other🔽by the division of the simultaneous and the obstructive,

original: gnyen po dang ni gzhan du brjod //
analyzed: gnyen po dang ni gzhan du brjod //
translated: and likewise the non-obstructive.🔽Even with regard to an object that is other than that

original: don de nyid las gzhan pa la'ang //
analyzed: don de nyid las gzhan pa la'ang //
translated: meaning,

original: dgag bya dag @252a * //
analyzed: dgag bya dag @252a * //
translated: 1.1.1.🔽The object of refutation is not different from the refutation,

original: las gzhan nyid dang // dgag bya nyid las mi gzhan pas //
analyzed: las gzhan nyid dang // dgag bya nyid las mi gzhan pas //
translated: and it is not non-different from the refutation.

original: 'gal dang gzhan dang zhum pa'o //
analyzed: 'gal dang gzhan dang zhum pa'o //
translated: [The object of refutation] is contradictory, different, and diminished.🔽1.1.2.🔽The object of demonstration is different,🔽and the object of refutation is similar.

original: bstan par bya ba gzhan nyid dang // dgag par bya ba 'dra ba dang // de bzhin yon tan nyid dang ni //
analyzed: bstan par bya ba gzhan nyid dang // dgag par bya ba 'dra ba dang // de bzhin yon tan nyid dang ni //
translated: Likewise, it is endowed with qualities,🔽1.1.3.🔽it is thoroughly elaborated,🔽it is the nature of an embodied being,🔽it is a gross entity of continuity,🔽it is a multitude of synonyms,🔽and likewise, it is a long duration,

original: kun du rnam par spros ba dang // lus su byed pa'i bdag nyid dang // rgyun gyi dngos po rags pa dang // 'dod pa'i rnam grangs du ma dang // de bzhin yun gyi chu srid dang // dngos kyi rang bzhin che ba dang // bsams pa'i don las log pa dang //
analyzed: kun du rnam par spros ba dang // lus su byed pa'i bdag nyid dang // rgyun gyi dngos po rags pa dang // 'dod pa'i rnam grangs du ma dang // de bzhin yun gyi chu srid dang // dngos kyi rang bzhin che ba dang // bsams pa'i don las log pa dang //
translated: it is a great essential nature,🔽and it is the opposite of the intended meaning.🔽1.1.4.🔽It is all-pervading,🔽it does not coexist,🔽it seizes the potency,

original: kun du khyab par gyur pa dang // lhan cig gnas pa ma yin dang // de la nus pa 'phrog byed dang // med pas mtshon pa'i yod pa yis //
analyzed: kun du khyab par gyur pa dang // lhan cig gnas pa ma yin dang // de la nus pa 'phrog byed dang // med pas mtshon pa'i yod pa yis //
translated: and it is existent by the illustration of non-existence.🔽1.1.5.

original: ji ltar bstan pa'i don bzhin du //
analyzed: ji ltar bstan pa'i don bzhin du //
translated: Just as it is demonstrated,

original: bsdu pa'i bye brag de bzhin no //
analyzed: bsdu pa'i bye brag de bzhin no //
translated: the distinctions of the collections are likewise.

original: dgag pa yul dang gnas skabs dang // dus la ltos par shes par byed //
analyzed: dgag pa yul dang gnas skabs dang // dus la ltos par shes par byed //
translated: Negation is to be understood as depending on an object, a situation, and a time.

original: de dag gsum mam gnyis gnyis sam //
analyzed: de dag gsum mam gnyis gnyis sam //
translated: They are threefold, twofold,

original: re re'i dbang la 'ang ltos pa yin //
analyzed: re re'i dbang la 'ang ltos pa yin //
translated: and single, depending on the situation.

original: spyi dang khyad par dbye ba na //
analyzed: spyi dang khyad par dbye ba na //
translated: The distinction of general and particular

original: yul dang dus la yod pa yin //
analyzed: yul dang dus la yod pa yin //
translated: exists in terms of object and time.

original: gnas skabs la yang cha yod do //
analyzed: gnas skabs la yang cha yod do //
translated: It also exists in terms of situation.🔽The characteristics of things

original: dngos po rnams kyi mtshan nyid dag / phan tshun gcig la gcig med pa //
analyzed: dngos po rnams kyi mtshan nyid dag / phan tshun gcig la gcig med pa //
translated: are mutually exclusive.

original: yul gyi khyad par la ltos pa'o //
analyzed: yul gyi khyad par la ltos pa'o //
translated: They depend on the distinction of the object.🔽The nature of cause and effect

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo dag / snga nas med dang zhig nas med //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo dag / snga nas med dang zhig nas med //
translated: is prior nonexistence and subsequent nonexistence.

original: dus kyi khyad par la ltos pa'o ;
analyzed: dus kyi khyad par la ltos pa'o ;
translated: They depend on the distinction of time.

original: / ri bong rva dang mo gsham bu //
analyzed: / ri bong rva dang mo gsham bu //
translated: The horns of a rabbit and the son of a barren woman

original: shin tu med par gyur pa ni //🔽yul dus spyi la ltos pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu med par gyur pa ni // yul dus spyi la ltos pa'o //
translated: are utterly nonexistent.

original: yul dang dus kyi dbang gis ni //
analyzed: yul dang dus kyi dbang gis ni //
translated: They depend on the general object and time.

original: med pa rnam pa bzhir 'dod do //
analyzed: med pa rnam pa bzhir 'dod do //
translated: Nonexistence is asserted to be of four kinds🔽in terms of object and time.

original: gnas skabs dag gi dbye ba yis //
analyzed: gnas skabs dag gi dbye ba yis //
translated: In terms of the distinction of situation,

original: med dang ma yin gnyen po'i don //
analyzed: med dang ma yin gnyen po'i don //
translated: nonexistence and nonentity are the meaning of antidote.

original: mi mthun chung sogs bral ba dang // mi 'dra ba dang gzhan pa'o //
analyzed: mi mthun chung sogs bral ba dang // mi 'dra ba dang gzhan pa'o //
translated: The absence of a pot is not a non-pot.🔽The absence of a pot is not a cow.🔽The absence of a pot is not a horse.🔽The absence of a pot is not a rabbit’s horn.

original: 'di ni sngon nam da ltar dag / bum pa med ces brjod pa gang //🔽med pa tsam zhig 'dod pa'am //
analyzed: 'di ni sngon nam da ltar dag / bum pa med ces brjod pa gang // med pa tsam zhig 'dod pa'am //
translated: The absence of a pot is not a sky-flower.🔽The absence of a pot is not a non-pot.

original: gal te yod pa 'dod kyang rung //🔽de ni gsum la ltos pa'o //
analyzed: gal te yod pa 'dod kyang rung // de ni gsum la ltos pa'o //
translated: The absence of a pot is not a cow.🔽The absence of a pot is not a horse.

original: gangs sam mi la sogs pa la //
analyzed: gangs sam mi la sogs pa la //
translated: The absence of a pot is not a rabbit’s horn.🔽The absence of a pot is not a sky-flower.

original: sngon nam da lta phyis kyang rung //
analyzed: sngon nam da lta phyis kyang rung //
translated: The absence of a pot is not a non-pot.🔽The absence of a pot is not a cow.🔽The absence of a pot is not a horse.

original: 'di la myu gu mi skye zhes //🔽dgag pa yang ni de bzhin no //
analyzed: 'di la myu gu mi skye zhes // dgag pa yang ni de bzhin no //
translated: The absence of a pot is not a rabbit’s horn.

original: so ga shing 'bras mi smin ces //🔽dgag pa dus dang gnas skabs la'o //
analyzed: so ga shing 'bras mi smin ces // dgag pa dus dang gnas skabs la'o //
translated: The absence of a pot is not a sky-flower.

original: 'di na da lta 'di med ces //🔽dgag pa yul dang dus la'o //
analyzed: 'di na da lta 'di med ces // dgag pa yul dang dus la'o //
translated: The absence of a pot is not a non-pot.🔽The absence of a pot is not a cow.

original: rta la ba lang med ces pa //🔽yul dang skabs la ltos pa yin //
analyzed: rta la ba lang med ces pa // yul dang skabs la ltos pa yin //
translated: The absence of a pot is not a horse.

original: gangs la myu gu skye med ces//🔽@252b dgag pa yul la ltos pa'o //
analyzed: gangs la myu gu skye med ces// @252b dgag pa yul la ltos pa'o //
translated: The absence of a pot is not a rabbit’s horn.🔽The absence of a pot is not a sky-flower.🔽The absence of a pot is not a non-pot.🔽The absence of a pot is not a cow.🔽The absence of a pot is not a horse.🔽The absence of a pot is not a rabbit’s horn.🔽The absence of a pot is not a sky-flower.🔽The absence of a pot is not a non-pot.🔽The absence of a pot is not a cow.🔽The absence of a pot is not a horse.🔽The absence of a pot is not a rabbit’s horn.🔽The absence of a pot is not a sky-flower.🔽The absence of a pot is not a non-pot.🔽The absence of a pot is not a cow.🔽The absence of a pot is not a horse.🔽The absence of a pot is not a rabbit’s horn.

original: lhas byin shi nas med ces pa //
analyzed: lhas byin shi nas med ces pa //
translated: The absence of a pot is not a sky-flower.

original: dgag pa dus la ltos pa'o //
analyzed: dgag pa dus la ltos pa'o //
translated: The absence of a pot is not a non-pot.🔽The absence of a pot is not a cow.

original: re re 'am gnyis ltos ston pa //
analyzed: re re 'am gnyis ltos ston pa //
translated: The absence of a pot is not a horse.🔽The absence of a pot is not a rabbit’s horn.🔽The absence of a pot is not a sky-flower.🔽The absence of a pot

original: khyad par mi 'dzin dbang du'o //
analyzed: khyad par mi 'dzin dbang du'o //
translated: The particular is the object of the faculty.

original: skabs ni kun tu'ang khyad par te //
analyzed: skabs ni kun tu'ang khyad par te //
translated: The occasion is the particular in every case.

original: skabs tsam spyi yi cha yin no //🔽dgos pa 'grub pa'i dbang du ni//
analyzed: skabs tsam spyi yi cha yin no // dgos pa 'grub pa'i dbang du ni//
translated: The occasion is merely a general category.

original: gsum nyid la ni ltos pa yin //
analyzed: gsum nyid la ni ltos pa yin //
translated: The three are dependent on the power of accomplishing the purpose.

original: yul ni dgag bya gzhi yin te //🔽dus gsum da lta'i dbang gis yin //
analyzed: yul ni dgag bya gzhi yin te // dus gsum da lta'i dbang gis yin //
translated: The object is the basis of the negatee.🔽The time is the present.

original: gnas skabs go bar bya ba'i dbang //🔽dgag pa go bar byed pa yi //
analyzed: gnas skabs go bar bya ba'i dbang // dgag pa go bar byed pa yi //
translated: The occasion is the power of understanding.

original: yul ni med pa gzhi yin te //
analyzed: yul ni med pa gzhi yin te //
translated: The object of the negation is the basis of the non-existent.

original: snga nas med dang zhig nas med //
analyzed: snga nas med dang zhig nas med //
translated: The non-existent from the beginning and the disintegrated non-existent.

original: gcig la gcig med shin tu med //
analyzed: gcig la gcig med shin tu med //
translated: The mutual non-existent and the complete non-existent.

original: go byed skabs ni gnyis yin te //
analyzed: go byed skabs ni gnyis yin te //
translated: The occasion of the understanding is twofold:

original: che long dang ni rgyas par ro //
analyzed: che long dang ni rgyas par ro //
translated: The gross and the extensive.

original: zhig nas med dang shin tu med //🔽med par dgag pa zhes 'dod do //
analyzed: zhig nas med dang shin tu med // med par dgag pa zhes 'dod do //
translated: The disintegrated non-existent and the complete non-existent.🔽Are asserted as the non-implicative negation.

original: lhag ma ma yin dgag par ni //
analyzed: lhag ma ma yin dgag par ni //
translated: The implicative negation is asserted

original: che long dbang gis 'dod pa ste //🔽yul na med dang yod pa yi //
analyzed: che long dbang gis 'dod pa ste // yul na med dang yod pa yi //
translated: By the power of the gross.

original: dbang tsam dag tu 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: dbang tsam dag tu 'dod pa'o //
translated: The object is the mere power of the non-existent and the existent.

original: med pa bzhi nyid mi shes pa'am //
analyzed: med pa bzhi nyid mi shes pa'am //
translated: Not knowing the four kinds of non-existence,

original: gal te yod sogs 'dod pa la //
analyzed: gal te yod sogs 'dod pa la //
translated: If one asserts existence and so forth,

original: med pa tsam zhig sgrub pa na //
analyzed: med pa tsam zhig sgrub pa na //
translated: When one establishes mere non-existence,

original: med par dgag pa bzhir 'dod do //
analyzed: med par dgag pa bzhir 'dod do //
translated: it is asserted to be a fourfold non-affirming negation.

original: gal te ri bong rva med pas //
analyzed: gal te ri bong rva med pas //
translated: If the non-existence of a rabbit's horns

original: dngos med de nyid sgrub byed na //
analyzed: dngos med de nyid sgrub byed na //
translated: establishes that very non-entity,

original: ma yin dgag par 'dod pa ste //
analyzed: ma yin dgag par 'dod pa ste //
translated: it is asserted to be an affirming negation,

original: tshig gcig rnam par sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: tshig gcig rnam par sgrub pa'o //
translated: establishing a single word.🔽Saying the effect does not exist in the cause

original: rgyu la 'bras bu med ces dang // 'bras bu la yang rgyu med ces //
analyzed: rgyu la 'bras bu med ces dang // 'bras bu la yang rgyu med ces //
translated: and the cause does not exist in the effect,

original: rgyu 'bras dngos po sgrub byed na //
analyzed: rgyu 'bras dngos po sgrub byed na //
translated: if one establishes the entities of cause and effect,

original: de yang de bzhin shes par bya //
analyzed: de yang de bzhin shes par bya //
translated: that should also be understood in the same way.

original: rta la ba lang med pa zhes //
analyzed: rta la ba lang med pa zhes //
translated: Saying there is no cow on the horse,

original: rta nyid sgrub par byed pa ni //
analyzed: rta nyid sgrub par byed pa ni //
translated: establishing horse-ness

original: ma yin dgag pa zhes 'dod do //🔽gang zhig bkag par gyur pa yis //
analyzed: ma yin dgag pa zhes 'dod do // gang zhig bkag par gyur pa yis //
translated: is asserted to be an affirming negation.🔽That which becomes an exclusion🔽by virtue of what is excluded,

original: gzhan du 'gal bar 'gyur ba dang // gang zhig nges par sgrub byed pa //
analyzed: gzhan du 'gal bar 'gyur ba dang // gang zhig nges par sgrub byed pa //
translated: and that which definitely establishes

original: dgag pa don gyis go ba'o //
analyzed: dgag pa don gyis go ba'o //
translated: is an implied negation.

original: ming gzhan dgag pas bstan pa'i dngos //
analyzed: ming gzhan dgag pas bstan pa'i dngos //
translated: The entity indicated by the exclusion of another name

original: 'gal dang nges pa med pa ni //
analyzed: 'gal dang nges pa med pa ni //
translated: is without contradiction and without uncertainty,

original: rang gi tshig gis mi ston pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi tshig gis mi ston pa'o //
translated: not indicated by its own words.

original: gang zhig sgrub pa de lta bus //
analyzed: gang zhig sgrub pa de lta bus //
translated: That which is established in such a way

original: dngos dang dngos po med pa yi //🔽de kho na nyid sgrub byed pa //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos po med pa yi // de kho na nyid sgrub byed pa //
translated: in terms of entity and non-entity

original: ma yin dgag pa zhes 'dod do //
analyzed: ma yin dgag pa zhes 'dod do //
translated: is asserted to be an implicative negation.

original: med pa dag ni de las gzhan //
analyzed: med pa dag ni de las gzhan //
translated: Non-existence is different from that.

original: mtshan nyid dbang gis dbye ba ni //
analyzed: mtshan nyid dbang gis dbye ba ni //
translated: The classification by way of characteristic

original: ma yin dgag pa'i dbye ba ste //
analyzed: ma yin dgag pa'i dbye ba ste //
translated: is the classification of implicative negation.🔽Non-existence has one characteristic,

original: med pa dag ni mtshan nyid gcig / mtshan bzhi'i dbang gis bzhi yin no //
analyzed: med pa dag ni mtshan nyid gcig / mtshan bzhi'i dbang gis bzhi yin no //
translated: but by way of four characteristics, there are four.

original: ma yin dgag pa'i mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: ma yin dgag pa'i mtshan nyid ni //
translated: The characteristic of implicative negation

original: byed pa'i dbang gis bzhi yin te //
analyzed: byed pa'i dbang gis bzhi yin te //
translated: is fourfold by way of function.

original: don gyis @253a * //
analyzed: don gyis @253a * //
translated: By way of meaning,

original: go bar byed pa dang // tshig gcig sgrub par byed pa dang // de dang ldan pa'i dgag pa dang // rang gi tshig gis mi ston pa'o //
analyzed: go bar byed pa dang // tshig gcig sgrub par byed pa dang // de dang ldan pa'i dgag pa dang // rang gi tshig gis mi ston pa'o //
translated: there is that which causes understanding, that which establishes a single word, that which negates by possessing that, and that which does not teach by its own words.

original: bya ba'i dbang gis bdun yin te //
analyzed: bya ba'i dbang gis bdun yin te //
translated: By way of function, there are seven,

original: med pa nyid ni ma gtogs pa'o //
analyzed: med pa nyid ni ma gtogs pa'o //
translated: except for non-existence.

original: mi mthun gnyen por bsdu ba yis //🔽drug gam 'gal dang gzhan pa yi //
analyzed: mi mthun gnyen por bsdu ba yis // drug gam 'gal dang gzhan pa yi //
translated: By way of including the discordant and its antidote,🔽there are six, or it should be understood that there are two,

original: gnyis su brjod par rig par bya //
analyzed: gnyis su brjod par rig par bya //
translated: contradictory and other.

original: dgag pa'i yul yang rnam gsum ste //
analyzed: dgag pa'i yul yang rnam gsum ste //
translated: The object of negation is also threefold:

original: gzhi yi yul dang bya ba'i yul //
analyzed: gzhi yi yul dang bya ba'i yul //
translated: the object of the basis, the object of action,

original: dgos pa'i yul du 'dod pa yin //
analyzed: dgos pa'i yul du 'dod pa yin //
translated: The object of negation is the object of the need.🔽The basis of negation, the object of negation,

original: dgag pa'i gzhi dang dgag bya dang // dgag pa'i dgos ched gsum gyis so //
analyzed: dgag pa'i gzhi dang dgag bya dang // dgag pa'i dgos ched gsum gyis so //
translated: and the purpose of negation are the three.

original: sgra ni bye brag med pa ste //
analyzed: sgra ni bye brag med pa ste //
translated: The word is without distinction,

original: dgos pa'i dbang gis shes par bya //
analyzed: dgos pa'i dbang gis shes par bya //
translated: but is to be understood by the power of the need.

original: gang phyir gang yang ldog byed pas //
analyzed: gang phyir gang yang ldog byed pas //
translated: Because it is the cause of the cessation of anything,

original: dgag pa zhes ni brjod pa yin //
analyzed: dgag pa zhes ni brjod pa yin //
translated: it is called “negation.”🔽The object of negation, the purpose,🔽the word, the time, the occasion,

original: dgag pa'i yul dang dgos pa dang // sgra dang dus dang gnas skabs dang // dgag bya ltos pa nges tshig gis //
analyzed: dgag pa'i yul dang dgos pa dang // sgra dang dus dang gnas skabs dang // dgag bya ltos pa nges tshig gis //
translated: and the object of negation in dependence are explained

original: rab tu gsal bar brjod pa yin //
analyzed: rab tu gsal bar brjod pa yin //
translated: by the derivation of the term.🔽In brief, by the object, dependence,

original: mdor ni yul dang ltos pa dang // sgra dang nges pa'i tshig gis so //
analyzed: mdor ni yul dang ltos pa dang // sgra dang nges pa'i tshig gis so //
translated: the word, and the derivation of the term.

original: dngos su brjod pa'i dgos pa ni //
analyzed: dngos su brjod pa'i dgos pa ni //
translated: The purpose of the expression🔽is the object of negation, the agent,🔽and the particular object and time,

original: dgag par bya dang byed pa dang // yul dang dus kyi khyad par dag / gcig gam gnyis sam yang na ni //
analyzed: dgag par bya dang byed pa dang // yul dang dus kyi khyad par dag / gcig gam gnyis sam yang na ni //
translated: either one, two, or else

original: spyi la ltos na med kyang rung //
analyzed: spyi la ltos na med kyang rung //
translated: in dependence on the general, it is also all right.

original: gnyis sam gsum mam bzhi yin no //
analyzed: gnyis sam gsum mam bzhi yin no //
translated: It is either two, three, or four.

original: dgag bya dngos po ma yin pa'i /
analyzed: dgag bya dngos po ma yin pa'i /
translated: The object of negation is not an entity.

original: las la sogs pa dgag pa dang // dgag bya bya ba nyid yin na //🔽bya ba gang gi yin de yi //
analyzed: las la sogs pa dgag pa dang // dgag bya bya ba nyid yin na // bya ba gang gi yin de yi //
translated: and of the activity of the object of refutation,🔽the basis of that

original: gzhi de gzhi yi yul yin no //
analyzed: gzhi de gzhi yi yul yin no //
translated: which is the action, is the domain of the basis.

original: med dang de yi tha snyad kyi //
analyzed: med dang de yi tha snyad kyi //
translated: The domain of nonexistence and of the convention

original: yul ni bye brag so so ste //
analyzed: yul ni bye brag so so ste //
translated: is the individual particular.

original: med pa'i yul ni gcig yin te //
analyzed: med pa'i yul ni gcig yin te //
translated: The domain of nonexistence is one,

original: gang la yod pa de yin no //
analyzed: gang la yod pa de yin no //
translated: and that which exists is the other.

original: tha snyad yul gyi bye brag dag / brjod pa'i yul ni gsum yin te //
analyzed: tha snyad yul gyi bye brag dag / brjod pa'i yul ni gsum yin te //
translated: The domain of expression is threefold,

original: gzhi sogs bstan pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: gzhi sogs bstan pa nyid yin no //
translated: as the basis and so on have been taught.

original: shes pa'i yul ni drug yin te //
analyzed: shes pa'i yul ni drug yin te //
translated: The domain of cognition is sixfold,🔽as the domain of nonexistence, of its nature,

original: med pa rang gi ngo bo dang // de yi gzhi dang dgag bya dang // dgos ched sbra dang 'jug pa ni //
analyzed: med pa rang gi ngo bo dang // de yi gzhi dang dgag bya dang // dgos ched sbra dang 'jug pa ni //
translated: of its basis, of the object of refutation,

original: shes pa'i yul dang 'dod pa yin //
analyzed: shes pa'i yul dang 'dod pa yin //
translated: of the purpose, and of engagement.

original: 'jug pa'i yul ni gnyis yin te //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i yul ni gnyis yin te //
translated: The domain of engagement is twofold,

original: don la 'jug dang ldog pa'o //
analyzed: don la 'jug dang ldog pa'o //
translated: as engagement and disengagement in the object.

original: sgra dang shes pa lus rnams kyi //
analyzed: sgra dang shes pa lus rnams kyi //
translated: The engagement of sound, cognition, and body

original: byed pa 'jug pa zhes 'dod do //
analyzed: byed pa 'jug pa zhes 'dod do //
translated: is asserted to be engagement.🔽In some cases, it engages the body,

original: kha cig tu ni lus la'ang 'jug / de yang shes pa dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: kha cig tu ni lus la'ang 'jug / de yang shes pa dang bcas pa'o //
translated: and that is also associated with cognition.

original: rang gi ngo bo'i dbye ba ni //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo'i dbye ba ni //
translated: The divisions of the nature of negation are🔽taught by way of the non-existence of the nature,

original: rang bzhin ji ltar med pa dang // ji ltar go bar byed pa dang // ji ltar go bar bya ba yis //
analyzed: rang bzhin ji ltar med pa dang // ji ltar go bar byed pa dang // ji ltar go bar bya ba yis //
translated: by way of the five kinds of negation,

original: dgag @253b pa'i dbye ba bstan pa yin //
analyzed: dgag @253b pa'i dbye ba bstan pa yin //
translated: and by way of the eight kinds of negation.

original: rang bzhin ji ltar med pa ni //
analyzed: rang bzhin ji ltar med pa ni //
translated: The non-existence of the nature

original: med pa rnam pa bzhi yin te //
analyzed: med pa rnam pa bzhi yin te //
translated: is fourfold.

original: ngo bo nyid kyis bzhag pa yin //🔽ji ltar go par byed pa ni //🔽don gyis go ba la sogs pa'i //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis bzhag pa yin // ji ltar go par byed pa ni // don gyis go ba la sogs pa'i //
translated: It is established by way of its own nature.🔽By way of the five kinds of negation

original: dgag pa rnam pa lnga yin te /
analyzed: dgag pa rnam pa lnga yin te /
translated: such as the negation by the meaning,

original: sgra dang skabs kyis bzhag pa yin //🔽ji ltar go bar bya ba ni //🔽med dang ma yin dbye ba yin //
analyzed: sgra dang skabs kyis bzhag pa yin // ji ltar go bar bya ba ni // med dang ma yin dbye ba yin //
translated: it is established by way of sound and context.🔽By way of the eight kinds of negation

original: dgag pa brgyad sogs dbye ba ste //
analyzed: dgag pa brgyad sogs dbye ba ste //
translated: such as the negation of non-existence,🔽it is established by way of the object of negation.

original: go bar bya ba'i dngos pos gzhag / ngo bo nyid kyi bye brag ni //
analyzed: go bar bya ba'i dngos pos gzhag / ngo bo nyid kyi bye brag ni //
translated: The particular nature

original: med pa'i dngos po med pa ste //🔽yul dang dus la rten pa yi //
analyzed: med pa'i dngos po med pa ste // yul dang dus la rten pa yi //
translated: is the non-existence of a non-existent thing.🔽The particular is said to be fourfold

original: bye brag gi ni bzhi zhes bya //
analyzed: bye brag gi ni bzhi zhes bya //
translated: in dependence on place and time.

original: go bar bya ba'i dngos po ni //
analyzed: go bar bya ba'i dngos po ni //
translated: The object of negation

original: med dam gal te yod kyang rung ;
analyzed: med dam gal te yod kyang rung ;
translated: is either non-existent or existent.

original: / skyes bu'i 'dod pa'i dbang byas pa'i //
analyzed: / skyes bu'i 'dod pa'i dbang byas pa'i //
translated: The person is under the power of desire.

original: dngos po nyid kyi stobs yin no //
analyzed: dngos po nyid kyi stobs yin no //
translated: The power of the thing itself is the cause of the desire of the person.

original: dgos pa dgag bya bzlog pa ste //
analyzed: dgos pa dgag bya bzlog pa ste //
translated: The purpose is the refutation of the object of negation,

original: byed dang byed po'i 'dod pa'o //🔽phyogs 'ga' dgag pa 'am gzhan sogs pas //
analyzed: byed dang byed po'i 'dod pa'o // phyogs 'ga' dgag pa 'am gzhan sogs pas //
translated: the desire of the agent and the action.

original: 'dod pa brgyud pa yin yang ngo //
analyzed: 'dod pa brgyud pa yin yang ngo //
translated: The sequence of desires is the negation of some part or the addition of something else.

original: sgra ni byed pa'i bdag nyid de //
analyzed: sgra ni byed pa'i bdag nyid de //
translated: Sound is the nature of the action.

original: dus ni rgyun ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: dus ni rgyun ces bya ba'o //
translated: Time is called the continuum.

original: dgos pa'i dus la skabs shes bya //
analyzed: dgos pa'i dus la skabs shes bya //
translated: The occasion is the time of the purpose.

original: bzlog par bya ba dgag bya'o //🔽gang gi dbang gis gzhag pa ni //
analyzed: bzlog par bya ba dgag bya'o // gang gi dbang gis gzhag pa ni //
translated: The object of negation is what is to be refuted.

original: dgag bya'i ltos pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dgag bya'i ltos pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The dependence of the object of negation is that by which it is posited.

original: nges tshig ldog pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: nges tshig ldog pa nyid yin no //
translated: The definition is the negation itself.🔽  The four kinds of non-existence are:

original: snga na med pa'i bye brag ni //
analyzed: snga na med pa'i bye brag ni //
translated: non-existence prior to the continuum,🔽non-existence in the continuum,🔽non-existence in the nature,

original: rgyun 'dra ba dang rang bzhin dang // skabs dang rten la med pa'o //
analyzed: rgyun 'dra ba dang rang bzhin dang // skabs dang rten la med pa'o //
translated: non-existence in the occasion, and non-existence in the basis.🔽  The four kinds of non-existence after the fact are:🔽non-existence after the continuum is destroyed,🔽non-existence after the nature is destroyed,

original: rgyun zhig pa dang rang bzhin dang // skabs dang rten las bral ba yis //
analyzed: rgyun zhig pa dang rang bzhin dang // skabs dang rten las bral ba yis //
translated: non-existence after the occasion is destroyed, and non-existence after the basis is destroyed.

original: zhig nas med pa bzhi yin no //🔽phan tshun gcig la gcig med pa //
analyzed: zhig nas med pa bzhi yin no //🔽phan tshun gcig la gcig med pa //
translated: The four kinds of mutual non-existence are:

original: mtshan nyid dbye ba yod mod kyi //
analyzed: mtshan nyid dbye ba yod mod kyi //
translated: Although there are divisions of characteristics,

original: rang bzhin nyid du bsdu bya ste //
analyzed: rang bzhin nyid du bsdu bya ste //
translated: they should be subsumed into the nature itself.

original: ji ltar gser gyi gdub rgyan dag //
analyzed: ji ltar gser gyi gdub rgyan dag //
translated: Just as a golden bracelet,

original: rigs dang bzo dang bong tshod dang // kha dog dbyibs rnams mtshungs mod kyi //
analyzed: rigs dang bzo dang bong tshod dang // kha dog dbyibs rnams mtshungs mod kyi //
translated: although similar in type, craft, size, color, and shape,

original: gcig gi rang bzhin gcig ma yin //
analyzed: gcig gi rang bzhin gcig ma yin //
translated: is not of the nature of the other.

original: yin na cig car gzung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: yin na cig car gzung bar 'gyur //
translated: If it were, it would be apprehended simultaneously.

original: shin tu med pa'i bye brag ni //
analyzed: shin tu med pa'i bye brag ni //
translated: The difference of complete non-existence

original: rgyu dang rang bzhin gnyis su shes //
analyzed: rgyu dang rang bzhin gnyis su shes //
translated: is known in terms of cause and nature.🔽The nature of the observed continuum

original: sems can skye ba la sogs pa //🔽rgyun dmigs pa yi rang bzhin ni //
analyzed: sems can skye ba la sogs pa // rgyun dmigs pa yi rang bzhin ni //
translated: of sentient beings' birth and so forth

original: rgyun 'dra snga na med pa'o //🔽sa bon sa dang 'o ma la //
analyzed: rgyun 'dra snga na med pa'o // sa bon sa dang 'o ma la //
translated: is a continuity without prior existence.🔽In the case of a sprout, pot, and butter,

original: myu gu bum pa mar rnams ni //
analyzed: myu gu bum pa mar rnams ni //
translated: from seeds, earth, and milk,

original: rang bzhin snga na med pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin snga na med pa'o //
translated: their nature is without prior existence.

original: ji ltar gser las rgyan sogs ni //
analyzed: ji ltar gser las rgyan sogs ni //
translated: Just as ornaments and so forth from gold,

original: gnas skabs snga na med pa'o //
analyzed: gnas skabs snga na med pa'o //
translated: are without prior existence in the state.

original: sa phyogs 'di na ba lang dag //
analyzed: sa phyogs 'di na ba lang dag //
translated: In this place, cows

original: sngon chad med pa rten la'o //
analyzed: sngon chad med pa rten la'o //
translated: are without prior existence in dependence.

original: ljon pa 'am skyes bu la sogs pa //
analyzed: ljon pa 'am skyes bu la sogs pa //
translated: In the case of a tree, person, and so forth,

original: tshig @254a * //
analyzed: tshig @254a * //
translated: the words🔽arose or died

original: gam shi bar gyur pa dag //
analyzed: gam shi bar gyur pa dag //
translated: are not suitable.

original: rgyun zhig gyur te med pa'o //🔽myu gu bum pa mar rnams la //
analyzed: rgyun zhig gyur te med pa'o // myu gu bum pa mar rnams la //
translated: It is the destruction of a continuum.🔽In the case of a sprout, a pot, and milk,

original: sa bon sa dang 'o ma ni //
analyzed: sa bon sa dang 'o ma ni //
translated: The seed, the ground, and the milk

original: rang bzhin zhig nas med pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin zhig nas med pa'o //
translated: Are destroyed by nature.

original: ji ltar gser gyi gdub rgyan las //🔽rna cha dag ni skabs zhig pa //
analyzed: ji ltar gser gyi gdub rgyan las // rna cha dag ni skabs zhig pa //
translated: In the case of a golden bracelet,🔽The earrings are destroyed by transformation.

original: sa phyogs 'di nas bum pa dag //
analyzed: sa phyogs 'di nas bum pa dag //
translated: In the case of a pot,

original: gzhan du 'phos te med pa ni //
analyzed: gzhan du 'phos te med pa ni //
translated: It is destroyed by moving to another place.

original: rten las bral te med pa'o //
analyzed: rten las bral te med pa'o //
translated: It is destroyed by separation from its basis.

original: ri bong rnga mo bong bu la //
analyzed: ri bong rnga mo bong bu la //
translated: In the case of a rabbit, a camel, and a donkey,

original: rva dang rva yi rgyu med ces //
analyzed: rva dang rva yi rgyu med ces //
translated: There is no horn and no cause of a horn.

original: rang bzhin dgag dang rgyu dgag pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin dgag dang rgyu dgag pa'o //
translated: This is the refutation of nature and the refutation of the cause.

original: dgag pa dus la ltos pa ni //
analyzed: dgag pa dus la ltos pa ni //
translated: The refutation that depends on time

original: dngos pos dus la ltos pa ste //
analyzed: dngos pos dus la ltos pa ste //
translated: Depends on time in terms of the thing.

original: smra ba po yi dus la ni //
analyzed: smra ba po yi dus la ni //
translated: The time of the speaker

original: nam yang khong du chud pa 'dzin //
analyzed: nam yang khong du chud pa 'dzin //
translated: Is never understood by the listener.

original: spyi tsam khong du chud bya dang // khyad par khong du chud bya dag //
analyzed: spyi tsam khong du chud bya dang // khyad par khong du chud bya dag //
translated: The general should be understood, and the specific should be understood.

original: smra ba'i bsam pa'ang gnyis su'o //
analyzed: smra ba'i bsam pa'ang gnyis su'o //
translated: The intention of the speaker is also twofold.

original: ngo bo ston pa ji snyed pa //
analyzed: ngo bo ston pa ji snyed pa //
translated: The essence is shown as much as there is,

original: de dag dgag pa'ang de snyed kyi //
analyzed: de dag dgag pa'ang de snyed kyi //
translated: And the refutation is as much as there is.

original: 'on kyang mdo ru bsdu ba ni //
analyzed: 'on kyang mdo ru bsdu ba ni //
translated: However, it is summarized in a verse.

original: de dag tsam du shes par bya //
analyzed: de dag tsam du shes par bya //
translated: One should understand them as just that.

original: ldog pa bsdus pa bstan pa'i tshig la 'ur byas pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: ldog pa bsdus pa bstan pa'i tshig la 'ur byas pa rdzogs so /
translated: The words that teach the summary of the reversals are finished.
